mapper.insert: insert into staff (staff_id, first_name, last_name, address_id, email, store_id, active, username, password, last_update, picture) values (#{staff_id,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{first_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{last_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address_id,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{store_id,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{active,jdbcType=BIT}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{last_update,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{picture,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY})
mapper.update: update staff set first_name = #{first_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_name = #{last_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address_id = #{address_id,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, store_id = #{store_id,jdbcType=TINYINT}, active = #{active,jdbcType=BIT}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update = #{last_update,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, picture = #{picture,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY} where staff_id = #{staff_id,jdbcType=TINYINT}
mapper.select: select staff_id, first_name, last_name, address_id, email, store_id, active, username, password, last_update, picture from staff where staff_id = #{staff_id,jdbcType=TINYINT}
select staff_id, first_name, last_name, address_id, email, store_id, active, username, password, last_update, picture from staff
